## Checklist

- [ ] Project builds (e.g. `cmake -B build` and `cmake --build build`, or platform script).
- [ ] Tests pass (e.g. `ctest --test-dir build` or script `-a test`).
- [ ] Code is formatted (e.g. `./scripts/format.sh`); CI clang-format will check.
- [ ] PR title (or commits) follow [Conventional Commits](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/) so release-please can update [CHANGELOG.md](CHANGELOG.md) (e.g. `feat: add X`, `fix: correct Y`). Do not hand-edit CHANGELOG for versioned entries.
- [ ] Docs updated if you changed behavior or public API.
